description: Try our easy to follow Uncle Tobys Plus Breakfast Bars recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Snack,Pescatarian,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Uncle Tobys Plus Breakfast Bars Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Uncle Tobys Traditional Rolled Oats
2.5 cups Uncle Tobys Plus Immune Support

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160 C fan forced.
Line one baking tray with non-stick baking paper.
Place all ingredients except the olive oil and maple in a large bowl and mix well.
In a small bowl, add maple and olive oil and whisk until mixture slightly thickens.
Combine maple mixture to the rest of ingredients and mix until well combined.
With clean hands, tightly press two heaped tablespoons of the mixture into bars and arrange them on the prepared trays and flatten slightly.
Bake for 35 - 40 minutes or until golden brown.
Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly before serving.
